name: HWEY Heist
description:
The Mexican Drug Lord (MD) goes on a mission to locate the HWEY Master and destroy it, so he can take all of its money!

---

GUIDE The Form of Currency:
The Mexican Drug Lord:
The HWEY Master:
A HWEY:
A HWEY Cub:
MD's Water Gun:

- HWEY: HWEYs are aggressive creatures who will kill you without hesitation, and it’s not out of instinct– it’s purely out of evil and malice!
- HWEY Cub: These aren’t aggressive like the more matured HWEYs. MD can eat them to replenish and increase his energy!
- MD’s Water Gun: This shoots out water, the weakness of HWEYs.

CONTROLS

- Arrow Keys: Move
- Z: Jump
- X: Fire
- R: Respawn (This is in case the game gets a little quirky. The spawn points are set automatically as you progress.)

---

This was made in three days for Ludum Dare 44 with the theme "Your life is currency."
